name: Salomon XA Pro 3D Mid CSWP J Shoes - Children to Youths
categories: XA Pro 3D Mid CSWP J Shoes
description: Featuring a quick-pull closure, waterproof textiles and a stout sole, the junior size is every bit as competent as the grown-up counterpart. Moulded midsoles provides cushioning and support for off-the-beaten-path adventures, while Sensifit technology adapts to any foot shape.ClimaShield uppers use waterproof-breathable textiles.Toecap and mud guard.Quicklace system provides a nuanced fit.Pocket on the tongue keeps laces out of the way.Breakaway lace system prevents tripping hazards in brushy environments.Gussetted tongue keeps out pebbles and duff.Sensifit technology cradles feet and provides a custom-feeling fit.EVA moulded midsole for cushioning and support.Outsoles are non-marking Contagrip for traction on a range of surfaces.
